summary:
### February 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/scaffold-eth-2

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Merged PR #1057 introduced RPC Overrides to simplify frontend RPC configuration.
  - Merged PR #1053 added verification for OP Retro Funding round 7, enhancing participation capabilities.
  - Merged PR #1049 upgraded dependencies (wagmi, viem, rainbowkit) to their latest versions, improving overall functionality.
  - Merged PR #1052 updated node version requirements in the README to assist Windows users.

- **Notable Bug Fixes:**
  - Merged PR #1048 removed indexed event parameters to address type errors in the documentation.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on enhancing user experience through improved configuration options and dependency updates.
  - Ongoing efforts to ensure compatibility and clarity in documentation for developers.

topPRs.title: Add OP Retro Funding round 7 verification
Update node version requirements on Readme
